name: ChurchSearch
description:
Church search is a future, fullstack web application that seeks to connect individuals to faith-based organizations through a collection of questions that both parties take, which the webapp uses to associate individual to organization.

Implemented Features

  • User authentication, using a combination of short-lived JSON web tokens, and a long-lived refresh tokens.
  • Backend database creation, and API interaction using Express.js and Prisma, with Typescript as the language of choice.

To Be Implemented

  • A frontend client, which handles API communications, created with the newest version of Angular.
  • Hosting of the webapp, using a combination of Google SQL Databases, Google Cloud Run, and Google Filestore.
